name: Hide Context Menu
css:
@namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);
/*====隐藏右键菜单选项====*/

/*==右键 - 字典==*/
#spell-no-suggestions,
#spell-add-to-dictionary,
#spell-check-enabled,
#spell-add-dictionaries-main,
#spell-dictionaries,
#spell-suggestions-separator， /*分隔线*/


/*==右键 - 图片==*/
#context-sendimage, /*发送图片*/
#context-setWallpaper, /*设为背景*/
#context-setDesktopBackground, /*设为壁纸*/
#abp-image-menuitem, /*过滤图片*/


/*==右键 - 页面==*/
#context-back, /*后退*/
#context-forward,/*前进*/
#context-reload,/*刷新*/
#context-stop,/*停止*/
#context-sep-stop, /*分隔线*/

#context-bookmarkpage, /*加书签*/
#context-savepage, /*页面另存为*/
#context-sendpage, /*发送页面*/
#context-sep-viewbgimage, /*分隔线*/

/*#context-viewbgimage,   查看背景图片*/
#context-viewsource,  /*查看页面代码*/

#context-openlinkintab, /*新标签打开*/
#context-openlink, /*新窗口打开*/
#context-sep-open, /*分隔线*/

#context-bookmarklink, /*链接加书签*/
#context-savelink,   /*链接另存为*/
#context-sendlink, /*发送链接*/
#context-searchselect, /*用xx搜索*/
#context-sendvideo,/*发送视频*/
#context-sendaudio,/*发送音频*/
#frame-sep, /*分隔线*/
#spell-separator, /*分隔线*/
#foxyproxy-contextmenu-icon+menuseparator, /*分隔线*/

/*==右键 - 输入框==*/
#context-undo, /*撤销*/
#context-sep-undo, /*分隔线*/

/*#context-cut,  剪切*/
/*#context-copy,  复制*/
/*#context-paste,  粘贴*/
#context-delete, /*删除*/
#context-sep-paste,/*分隔线*/
#context-sep-selectall, /*分隔线*/


/*==Page Saver选项==*/
#PageSaverSaveVisibleImage, 
#PageSaverSaveEntireImage,
#PageSaverSaveFrameImage
{display: none !important;} 



/*==隐藏所有分隔线==*/
/*menuseparator {display:none !important;}*/

/*==隐藏关闭状态栏XX==*/
#addonbar-closebutton {display:none !important;}

/*====隐藏右键菜单选项结束====*/


/*====隐藏附加组件右键菜单选项====*/
/*Mozilla Archive Format*/
#mafMenuSavePageInArchive_pageContextMenu,
#mafMenuSaveTabsAs_pageContextMenu,
#mafMenuSaveAllTabsAs_pageContextMenu,

/*Adobe Acrobat*/
#acro_web2pdf_JavaStrings,
#acro_web2pdf_ContextMenuSeparatorStart,
#acro_web2pdf_ConvertContextMenu_SelectedLink,
#acro_web2pdf_AppendContextMenu_SelectedLink,
#acro_web2pdf_ConvertContextMenu,
#acro_web2pdf_AppendContextMenu,
#acro_web2pdf_ConvertContextMenu_Selection,
#acro_web2pdf_AppendContextMenu_Selection,

/*FastestFox/SmartFox*/
#smarterwiki-download-media,
#smarterwiki-download-links,
#smarterwiki-download-images,
#smarterwiki-download-selection,
#smarterwiki-remove-selection,
#smarterwiki-search-selection,
#menuitem_context_open_kwiclick,
#menuitem_context_sites_kwiclick,
#context-conqueryModoki,
#context-searchselect,

/*FoxyProxy Standard*/
#foxyproxy-contextmenu-icon,

/*It's All Text!*/
/*#itsalltext-contextmenu,*/

/*Yet Another Smooth Scrolling*/
#yass-changepreset-sep,
#yass-changepreset-red,
#yass-changepreset-green,
#yass-changepreset-blue,

/*LastPass*/
#lpt_lpcontentareacontextmenuseparator,
#lpt_lplogintolastpass,
#lpt_lpcontentareacontextmenu,
#lpt_lpfillformsmenu4,

/*CoolPreviews*/
#coolirisSend,
#coolirisAddStack,
#coolirisSearch,

/*ScrapBook*/
#ScrapBookContextMenu0,
#ScrapBookContextMenu1,
#ScrapBookContextMenu2,
#ScrapBookContextMenu3,
#ScrapBookContextMenu4,
#ScrapBookContextMenu5,
#ScrapBookContextMenu6,
#ScrapBookContextMenu8,
#ScrapBookContextSubmenu,
#ScrapBookContextMenu9,

/*Screengrab*/
#screengrab-context-separator,
#screengrab-context-menu,

/*NoScript*/
#noscript-context-menu,

/*GProxy Tool*/
#gproxy-context-separator,
#gproxy-context-menu,

/*Internet Download Manager*/
#idmmzcc-sep,
/*#idmmzcc-dwnl1,*/
#idmmzcc-flv,
#idmmzcc-flv-dwnl_a,
#idmmzcc-flv-dwnl10_a,
#idmmzcc-dwnlall,

/*openNewTabLite.uc.xul*/
#context_recentlyClosedTabs,
#context_duplicateTab,
#context_protectTab,
#context_lockTab,
#context_freezeTab,
#context_faviconizeTab,
#context_hideTab
{display: none !important;}
